translation.en: -What are you doing? -[gasps]
Oh, my God.
Please go.
-Well, I don't think that's very-- -Just go!
[Violet] What are you doing?
I asked you first.
This is higher than I thought.
Hey, look.
Look what I can do.
Stop. Stop!
Hey. Do you have plans this weekend? My parents are gonna be out of town.
translation.de: Machst du was am Wochenende? Meine Eltern sind weg.

translation.en: I was thinking about having a party or something.
translation.de: Ich dachte an eine Party oder so.

translation.en: You OK?
[man] How's everything going?
"Everything" is a really big word.
-Let's start with-- -[boy] Do you mean physically?
Emotionally? Those both could encompass "everything." Or is "everything" encompassed by both things?
translation.de: Emotional? "Alles" könnte beides umfassen. Oder wird es von beidem umfasst?

translation.en: Are you feeling overwhelmed by anything?
If "everything" is encompassed by both things, are they a part of our reality, or are they somewhere else?
translation.de: Wenn "alles" beides umfasst, ist das noch ein Teil unserer Realität?

translation.en: This isn't funny, Theodore.
I need you to take these meetings seriously. I get it.
translation.de: -Du musst diese Treffen ernst nehmen. -Ich verstehe.

translation.en: OK, do you "get" that you're on probation,
and in danger of not graduating?
You've already missed two weeks of school this year.
translation.de: Du hast dieses Jahr schon zwei Fehlwochen.

translation.en: Yeah, um...
-my grandma-- -Stop one second.
I just wanna clarify real quickly.
Is this the grandma who's died four times over the past three years?
translation.de: die Oma, die schon vier Mal gestorben ist?

translation.en: Five times, actually.
This is the fifth.
She's our miracle.
I really wanna help you, but you've gotta take this seriously.
translation.de: Ich will dir helfen, aber du musst das ernst nehmen.

translation.en: I mean, you agreed to these terms, these weekly counseling sessions,
translation.de: Du warst doch damit einverstanden: einmal pro Woche Beratung,

translation.en: maintaining a B-average, extracurricular participation.
And I am loving pottery.
Come on, man.
Look, I get it. If I screw anything up, I'm out.
translation.de: Ich verstehe schon: Vermassle ich was, bin ich raus.

translation.en: We're not askin' a lot of you, Finch.
You just need to show up.
[girl] My parents are pissed because I missed early admissions, but it's not like that matters, anyway.
translation.de: Meine Eltern sind sauer, weil ich mich noch nirgends beworben habe.

translation.en: I mean, I know I'm gonna get in.
translation.de: Aber ich schaffe es doch eh.

translation.en: Did you apply anywhere yet?
So, you going to Amanda's party?
[boy] It'll be fun.
So I've heard. It couldn't hurt to have a little fun, right?
translation.de: -Habe ich gehört. -Etwas Spaß schadet nicht, oder?

translation.en: Yo, do you think it'd be weird if I named my kid after a famous person?
translation.de: Wäre es komisch, mein Kind nach einer berühmten Person zu nennen?

translation.en: Like, if I named him Danny DeVito Donahue,
translation.de: Wenn ich ihn Danny DeVito Donahue nenne,

translation.en: do you... do you think he'd be mad about it?
translation.de: wird er mir das später übel nehmen?

translation.en: Is "DeVito" the middle name? Yeah.
Follow-up question: how high are you right now?
translation.de: Und wie high bist du gerade?

translation.en: On the scale, I'd probably say very... this way.
-[Finch] On the scale... -[boy] Yeah?
What are you looking at?
Just admiring the social norms of teenage angst.
translation.de: Ich bewundere nur die sozialen Normen der Teenagerangst.

translation.en: -Are you looking at Violet Markey? -Yep.
Her, um...
her sister died, right?
Yeah, dude.
Why ask about her all of a sudden?
I'm intrigued. A guy can't be intrigued?
translation.de: -Darf ein Mann nicht fasziniert sein? -Ein Mann ja.

translation.en: Well, a guy can be intrigued. You being intrigued is weird.
translation.de: -Darf ein Mann nicht fasziniert sein? -Ein Mann ja. Bei dir ist das seltsam.

translation.en: -[boy] Definitely weird. -No, I don't think it's weird.
translation.de: -Auf jeden Fall. -Ich finde das nicht seltsam.

translation.en: I wouldn't say "weird." Wait, if you don't think you're weird, well...
translation.de: -Warum seltsam? -Wenn du dich nicht seltsam findest...

translation.en: -Yeah, that's true. Very true. -[boy] She has a point.
-[woman] Your guidance counselor called. -Embryo?
[woman] What?
His name's Embry. I call him Embryo. It's the little things, Kate.
translation.de: Er heißt Embry, ich nenne ihn Embryo. Ein kleiner Spaß.

translation.en: Did you do something I should be worried about?
I'm genuinely offended by that supposition.
translation.de: Diese Annahme finde ich echt kränkend.

translation.en: -Finch. -No.
It's fine. I'll deal with it.
-[Kate] I hate when you say that. -Why?
Because what you really mean is that I'm gonna have to deal with it.
translation.de: Er meint, ich werde es regeln müssen.

translation.en: Did you cut class again? No! For fuck's sake,
just go hang out with Tina or whatever it is you do. I'm fine.
translation.de: Triff dich mit Tina oder mach sonst was. Mir geht's gut.

translation.en: OK. I'm gonna be home late. There's food in the fridge.
translation.de: Ok. Ich komme spät. Im Kühlschrank ist Essen.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Real food, Finch.
Where's Mom? She had to go to Chicago for business. Remember?
translation.de: -Wo ist Mom? -Geschäftlich in Chicago. Weißt du noch?

translation.en: -Oh, yeah, right. Cool. -Love you.
translation.de: Ja, stimmt. Cool. Hab dich lieb.

translation.en: [Finch] Hey.
-Love you. -Love you.
[Kate] No more cheese, Finch!
I'm gonna get the dessert.
[Dad] Your mother and I know that today couldn't have been easy.
translation.de: Mom und ich wissen, es war heute schwer für dich.

translation.en: And it wasn't easy for us either.
translation.de: Für uns war es auch schwer.

translation.en: -If you need to talk about it-- -[door opens]
[Mom] I thought this would be nice.
I've been making it for 19 years.
[teacher] As some of you will be graduating and leaving us at the end of the year,
translation.de: Manche von Ihnen machen den Abschluss und verlassen uns.

translation.en: I feel an obligation to make sure you see the wondrous sights of Indiana
translation.de: Darum will ich dafür sorgen, dass Sie die Wunder Indianas sehen,

translation.en: while you can.
To wander them, if you will.
For your class project, you must report on two or more wonders of Indiana.
translation.de: Ihr Projekt soll zwei oder mehr Wunder Indianas behandeln.

translation.en: You will write about them,
explain their significance to you and to Indiana, and why you chose to visit them.
translation.de: ihre Bedeutung für Sie und für Indiana und Ihre Wahl erklären.

translation.en: I want you to take time on this assignment.
Be thoughtful.
[teacher] OK.
What just happened?
That was so weird.
-What? -[teacher] All right, settle. Violet, are you OK?
All right, let's take our seats. Let's focus up.
translation.de: Ok, setzen wir uns. Zurück zum Thema.

translation.en: If you're done, Mr. Finch?
Yes, I am done, and can I just say you are doing a fine job teaching this class.
translation.de: Bin ich. Und ich möchte sagen, Ihr Unterricht ist fabelhaft.

translation.en: My young brain is plump with knowledge.
translation.de: Mein junges Hirn platzt vor Wissen.

translation.en: -[teacher] Thank you, Mr. Finch. -You're welcome.
[teacher] As I was saying, you'll be taking photos, doing some drawings, capturing detail.
translation.de: Wie gesagt, machen Sie Fotos, Zeichnungen, erfassen Sie Details.

translation.en: You will be doing this in teams of two.
translation.de: Sie werden das in Zweierteams machen.

translation.en: Can we choose our partners?
Yes, Mr. Finch.
Hey.
So, um...
do you think that there's such a thing as a perfect day?
translation.de: Würdest du sagen, es gibt so was wie perfekte Tage?

translation.en: I'm the last person you should be asking.
translation.de: Ich bin die Letzte, die das weiß.

translation.en: [Violet] For my geography class,
this teacher wants us to do this project with a partner,
translation.de: soll ich mit einem Partner an einem Projekt arbeiten.

translation.en: and I just don't wanna do it.
Well, did you ask for an alternate project?
Yeah, he just... he wouldn't listen.
Well, maybe it's time to get back out there. That's the same thing he said.
translation.de: -Geh doch wieder mehr unter Leute. -Genau seine Worte.

translation.en: I know it's hard.
-But you just don't go out anymore. -That's not true.
translation.de: -Aber du gehst nicht mehr raus. -Stimmt nicht.

translation.en: When's the last time you hung out with your friends?
translation.de: Wann warst du zuletzt mit Freunden weg?

translation.en: I think it would be really good if you'd spend some time with them.
translation.de: Es täte dir gut, mit ihnen Zeit zu verbringen.

translation.en: So, if I hung out with my friends, you'd get me outta this assignment?
translation.de: Wenn ich das tue, regelst du das mit dem Projekt?

translation.en: -[Amanda] You came. -[Violet] I did.
-[girl] Hey. -Hi.
-I'm gonna get a drink. Do you want one? -I'm good.
Come on, babe.
OK.
Yeah...
That's a heavy pour.
You know me. I love to rage.
translation.de: Du kennst mich. Ich übertreibe gern.

translation.en: [chuckles] So, you wanna go out back? Talk a little?
I think I'm gonna leave pretty soon, actually.
Really? But... I mean, I just got here.
translation.de: Wirklich? Ich bin gerade erst gekommen.

translation.en: It's just all a little much, you know?
translation.de: Es ist mir alles etwas zu viel.

translation.en: How much longer are you gonna act like this?
translation.de: Wie lange willst du noch so sein?

translation.en: It's been months. When are you gonna just...
translation.de: Es ist Monate her. Wann wirst du...

translation.en: Nice.
Violet, you know I didn't mean it like that. Just...
translation.de: Violet, du weißt, wie ich das meinte.

translation.en: [Finch] Violet Markey, if you're seeing this, you're still alive.
translation.de: Violet Markey, wenn du das siehst, bist du noch am Leben.

translation.en: Please call to confirm.
translation.de: Ruf bitte an. RUF MICH AN

translation.en: [singing] ♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
translation.de: Ich traf dich auf der Brücke

translation.en: ♪ What's going on Inside that pretty head? ♪
translation.de: Was geht in diesem hübschen Kopf vor?

translation.en: ♪ I met you standing on a ledge ♪
translation.de: Ich traf dich auf der Brücke

translation.en: ♪ Why don't you come talk to me instead? ♪
translation.de: Komm lieber zu mir und wir reden

translation.en: Theodore Finch speaking.
Take it down now.
The video will self-destruct in three, two...
translation.de: Das Video zerstört sich selbst in drei, zwei...

translation.en: ...please refresh.
Why would you do that? I wanna talk about the bridge.
translation.de: -Warum tust du das? -Ich will über die Brücke reden.

translation.en: [Finch] "I feel we can't go through another of those terrible times."
translation.de: "So schlimme Zeiten stehen wir nicht noch mal durch."

translation.en: One morning barely qualifies as a terrible time.
translation.de: Ein Morgen gilt wohl kaum als schlimme Zeiten.

translation.en: It's a quote.
OK.
Can I come over?
[Violet] Now?
Yeah.
So...
I Googled you.
You Googled me?
Yeah, what's with that... the website that you have with your sister?
translation.de: Ja, was ist mit der... Website, die du zusammen mit deiner Schwester hast?

translation.en: Had.
I read some of your stuff. It's really good.
translation.de: Was du schreibst, ist echt gut.

translation.en: I don't write anymore.
So, you moved here from California.
translation.de: Du bist also aus Kalifornien hergezogen.

translation.en: How was that?
California to Indiana?
Must've been different.
Yeah.
I didn't know that it happened there.
At the bridge.
I'm not, you know...
Suicidal?
You can say it.
Well, I'm not.
Whatever you are, I saved your life.
translation.de: Was immer du bist, ich habe dein Leben gerettet.

translation.en: No, you didn't.
You're making a big deal out of nothing.
translation.de: Du machst viel Lärm um nichts.

translation.en: Mm... kinda looked like somethin'.
What do you want from me?
I was just thinkin' that we should be partners.
translation.de: Ich dachte nur, wir sollten Partner werden.

translation.en: For the wandering project.
I think it would be good for you to get out.
translation.de: Es wäre gut für dich, mal rauszukommen.

translation.en: Maybe I don't wanna get out.
Maybe I'm sick of people.
Yeah, people are stupid.
But the tiniest few might actually mean well.
translation.de: Aber ein kleiner Anteil von ihnen meint es vielleicht gut.

translation.en: Why do you wanna do this with me, anyway?
translation.de: Warum willst du mich als Partnerin?

translation.en: Because there are places that need to be seen.
translation.de: Weil es Orte gibt, die man sehen muss.

translation.en: Maybe even the smallest of places can mean something.
translation.de: Vielleicht können die kleinsten Orte etwas bedeuten.

translation.en: At the very least, maybe they can mean something to us.
translation.de: Zumindest können sie vielleicht uns etwas bedeuten.

translation.en: Not an "us."
Maybe they can mean something to you and me.
translation.de: Vielleicht können sie dir und mir etwas bedeuten.

translation.en: Jesus, they call me anti-social.
translation.de: Und man hält mich für asozial.

translation.en: Two wanders. That's all.
We can do more if you end up loving it. I won't.
translation.de: -Wenn es dir gefällt, dann gern mehr. -Wird es nicht.

translation.en: [Finch] You might.
[sighs] No, I won't.
Oh, I found another quote for you.
translation.de: Ach so, ich habe noch ein Zitat für dich.

translation.en: "I feel a thousand capacities spring up in me."
translation.de: "Ich spüre tausend Fähigkeiten in mir sprießen."

translation.en: The Waves. It's from The Waves.
translation.de: Die Wellen. Das ist aus Die Wellen.

translation.en: You've got at least a thousand capacities in you.
translation.de: Du hast mindestens tausend Fähigkeiten in dir.

translation.en: Even if you don't think so.
You can keep that one.
You know people call you "The Freak," right?
Yeah.
Sometimes I say and do things without thinking, and...
translation.de: Manchmal sage und tue ich Dinge, ohne nachzudenken, und...

translation.en: people don't like that, people like labels.
translation.de: ...das mag man nicht. Leute mögen Etiketten.

translation.en: They like putting you in a box. They want you to be who they want you to be.
translation.de: Sie stecken dich in Schubladen, die sie dir selbst aussuchen.

translation.en: People don't like messy.
Or different.
My parents are calling Hudson to get me outta the project,
translation.de: Meine Eltern reden wegen des Projekts mit Hudson.

translation.en: so you need to find another partner.
OK.
Good night, Violet Markey.
Good night...
Theodore Finch.
[Finch] Hey. Hey!
Hey, where you going?
Home.
How'd it go with Hudson?
Not great.
Yeah.
He feels pretty strongly about participation.
OK...
but no cars.
Come again?
If you wanna do this with me,
you have to figure out another way because I'm not getting in a car.
translation.de: lass dir was einfallen, denn ich steige in kein Auto.

translation.en: [Finch] Can I ask you a question?
Where would you go if you could go anywhere?
translation.de: Wo würdest du am liebsten leben?

translation.en: -[Violet] California. -[Finch] But you've already been there.
translation.de: Kalifornien. Aber da warst du schon.

translation.en: [Violet] Yeah.
It's warm and it never snows.
translation.de: Es ist warm und es schneit nie.

translation.en: [Finch] Don't you wanna know where I'd go if I could go anywhere?
translation.de: Willst du nicht wissen, was ich wählen würde?

translation.en: [Violet] Where would you go if you could go anywhere?
translation.de: Wo würdest du am liebsten leben?

translation.en: [Finch] I'd go to a place no one's ever been before.
translation.de: Am liebsten an einem Ort, an dem noch niemand war.

translation.en: Undiscovered.
Untouched.
You could come... if you want.
That's it?
Get on up here, Ultraviolet.
No.
Come on.
Come on. The view is incredible.
Come on.
[Finch] So, what do we think?
The highest point in Indiana.
I think if I were here for literally any other reason than why you and I are here,
translation.de: Wenn ich hier nicht gezwungenermaßen wegen des Projekts wäre,

translation.en: I'd be pissed.
Oh, wow. Is that a sense of humor you're hiding in there?
translation.de: Wow. Versteckst du da so was wie Sinn für Humor?

translation.en: This is the lamest thing I think I've ever seen.
translation.de: Das ist das Ödeste, was ich je gesehen habe.

translation.en: It's OK, you know? You're not going to hell for laughing.
translation.de: Für Lachen kommt man nicht in die Hölle.

translation.en: [chuckles] It's pretty lame.
It was my sister's birthday.
She would've been 19.
That's why I was at the bridge.
translation.de: Darum war ich auf der Brücke.

translation.en: Why were you there?
I like to run.
It's pretty early to run. Yeah.
Let's jump.
You with me?
All right, on three.
You gotta get ready.
One... there it is,
two,
three.
[Finch] All right.
These are the things we leave behind.
Pick one.
Not that one.
Yeah. That's a good choice.
-What? -You didn't know?
This is a motherfucking staring contest.
You can't be serious.
Look at my face. I'm really serious.
translation.de: Sieh mich an. Es ist ernst.

translation.en: Fine.
I'm very competitive. Me too.
I'm staying over at Tina's tonight.
OK.
"OK"?
Yeah.
Usually, that incites a diatribe
-about how Tina's an asshole... -"Diatribe." Good word.
...and how I shouldn't spend so much time with her.
translation.de: ...und ich hänge zu viel mit ihr ab?

translation.en: Yeah, well, it appears that my many rantings on this topic
translation.de: Mein Gezeter zu diesem Thema ist wohl endlich bei dir hängengeblieben,

translation.en: have stuck with you, and I don't have to preach anymore.
translation.de: Mein Gezeter zu diesem Thema ist wohl endlich bei dir hängengeblieben, ich muss nicht mehr predigen.

translation.en: What's going on with you?
Nothing.
You seem, like...
goofy.
You're goofy.
[Finch] "I feel we can't go through another of those terrible times."
translation.de: "So schlimme Zeiten stehen wir nicht noch mal durch."

translation.en: [Violet] "Why are women so much more interesting to men than men are to women?"
translation.de: "Warum sind Frauen für Männer viel interessanter als Männer für Frauen?"

translation.en: [Finch] "My own brain is, to me, the most unaccountable of machinery,
translation.de: "Mein Gehirn ist für mich die unerklärlichste Maschinerie,

translation.en: always buzzing, humming, soaring, roaring, diving, and then buried in mud.
translation.de: die immerzu summt, steigt, brüllt, sinkt und dann im Schlamm begraben wird.

translation.en: And why?
What's this passion for?"
[Violet] "If you do not tell the truth about yourself,
translation.de: "Wer nicht die Wahrheit über sich sagt,

translation.en: you cannot tell it about other people."
translation.de: kann sie nicht über andere sagen."

translation.en: [Finch] Tell me about Eleanor.
She was bossy... like you.
translation.de: Sie kommandierte gern herum... wie du.

translation.en: I like her already.
She hated reading.
She only liked this Italian poet,
He said, "We do not remember days, we remember moments."
translation.de: Er sagte: "Wir erinnern uns nicht an Tage, wir erinnern uns an Momente."

translation.en: Any time I was having a bad day,
she always said that. Like it was supposed to fix something.
translation.de: sagte sie das immer, als würde es davon besser werden.

translation.en: Did it?
Yeah.
It did.
What else?
She was my best friend.
Sister...
best friend."
That's a pretty good epitaph.

I was here."
Yeah, I'm gonna have to steal that one from you.

[Dad] Yeah.
-Blueberry pancakes? -[Dad] Yup.
Lookin' pretty good.

-[Dad] Yeah. Well, give it a-- -[Violet] Almost ready.

[Dad] OK.

[Amanda] Where've you been?
You're not mad that I'm doing that project with Roamer, right?
translation.de: Bist du sauer, -weil ich das Projekt mit Roamer mache? -Nein.

translation.en: No.
translation.de: -weil ich das Projekt mit Roamer mache? -Nein.

translation.en: OK, cool. 'Cause it's, like, it's not a thing.
No, it's fine. I'm doing it with Finch.
translation.de: Schon ok, ich mache es mit Finch.

translation.en: With Finch?
Yeah.
You know that he's, like, kinda dangerous?
translation.de: Du weißt, dass er irgendwie gefährlich ist.

translation.en: No, he's not.
He freaked out last year and threw a chair at Roamer, like, in the middle of class.
translation.de: Letztes Jahr warf er im Unterricht einen Stuhl auf Roamer.

translation.en: He did?
[Amanda] Yeah, like, Roamer was fine, but he's seriously fucked up.
translation.de: Ja. Roamer ist nichts passiert, aber der Typ spinnt total.

translation.de: Ich dachte, wir sollten uns den Schuhbaum oder das verlassene Autokino ansehen,

translation.en: depending on whatever you're feeling.
What is this?
That's a reminder that sooner or later,
translation.de: Eine Erinnerung daran, dass du irgendwann

translation.en: But I'm happy pushing you for now.

translation.en: Well, I said I was only gonna do two, so...
translation.de: Ich sagte, ich mache nur zwei Sachen, also...

translation.en: I prefer Private Violet to... Public Violet.
translation.de: Mir ist die private Violet lieber als die öffentliche.

translation.en: Can you put her on?
I'll wait. [boy] Maybe you should give her some space.
Nice sweater. What's that, a cotton blend?
People think this whole "freak" thing is an act. I know it's real.

translation.en: Of course it is.
How are things?
Just your average teenage melodrama.
Come on. You gotta give me more than that.
People are always telling me what I am.
translation.de: Man erzählt mir immer, was ich bin.

translation.en: A freak.
I get it.
Doesn't mean it doesn't piss me off sometimes.

Come on, man.
Come on. Help me out here. Come on. Help me out.

translation.en: you could put it right over there.
It would really give me the mise en scène that I was looking for.

Did you look into that support group I told you to check out?
I might've lost the info on that one.
Come on, Theodore. It's a small ask, man.

translation.de: Es ist montags nach der Schule in der First Congregational Church.

so you can say whatever you want about anything that's bothering you.
translation.de: Du kannst also über alles reden, was dich beschäftigt.

What now? Now what are we doing? What?

-This is off-brand. -Please leave now.

Yeah.

translation.en: -At least sit inside. -No, Finch.
I'm not getting in a car! Look, here. I'll take the keys, and...
translation.de: -Ich steige in kein Auto! -Ich nehme den Schlüssel und...

translation.en: I swear not to drive faster than 30 miles per hour through town
translation.de: Ich schwöre, ich fahre maximal 50 km/h in der Stadt

translation.en: or 50 on the interstate.
If at any time you wanna stop, we stop.
You can't keep pushing people.
You don't listen. We did it. The project is over. This is over.
translation.de: Du hörst mir nicht zu. Wir sind fertig. Das Projekt ist vorbei.

translation.en: You know this isn't about a class assignment.
translation.de: Du weißt, es geht nicht darum.

translation.en: This is about you being holed up in your room or on your stupid bike,
translation.de: Du verkriechst dich in deinem Zimmer oder fährst Fahrrad

translation.en: always circling the same three-mile radius.
And God forbid anyone risk upsetting "Poor Violet," but...
translation.de: Und niemand will die "arme Violet" aufregen, aber...

translation.en: -they're wrong. -[door opening]
[Mom] Violet.
Is everything OK out here?
-Fine. -Hey.
Sorry. Hey. Hi, I'm Theodore Finch. Pleasure to meet you both.
translation.de: Entschuldigen Sie, ich bin Theodore Finch. Freut mich sehr.

translation.en: -Little early, don't you think, Theodore? -Yes. Yes, it is early.
translation.de: Etwas früh am Tag, oder? Ja, es ist früh. Eine zutreffende Beobachtung.

translation.en: That is a fair observation.
translation.de: Ja, es ist früh. Eine zutreffende Beobachtung.

translation.en: But you see, I'm your daughter's partner for the school project, and we really need to get to this place.
translation.de: Aber wir arbeiten zusammen am Schulprojekt und müssen wirklich an diesen Ort.

translation.en: Basically, I need her to get into the car.
translation.de: Ich muss sie ins Auto kriegen.

translation.en: That car.
That is extremely safe, insured,
with an experienced driver who hasn't gotten so much as a speeding ticket.
translation.de: und der Fahrer bekam noch nie einen Strafzettel.

translation.en: This is for a school project?
[Finch] Yes, sir. We're partners.
Well, Theodore, I think it's Violet's decision to make, but...
translation.de: Theodore, ich denke, es ist Violets Entscheidung, aber...

translation.en: maybe not a bad idea.
You think she's coming back?
Hey, your guess is as good as ours.
translation.de: Das wissen wir genauso wenig wie du.

translation.en: No, wait. No.
OK. If I were keys, where would I hide?
translation.de: Wenn ich ein Schlüssel wäre, wo würde ich mich verstecken?

translation.en: How are we doin' over there? Fine.
You sure? Just stop asking me. You're making it worse.
Talk about something else.
Usually, that is my forte. But right now, I got nothin'.
translation.de: Normalerweise ist das meine Stärke, aber gerade fällt mir nichts ein.

translation.en: It's a good song.
I don't remember how fast we were going.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht mehr, wie schnell wir waren.

translation.en: It didn't seem fast.
Then we were sliding...
and Eleanor was saying, "I can't hold on."
translation.de: Eleanor sagte: "Ich kann ihn nicht halten."

translation.en: And then the car slammed into the bridge.
translation.de: Dann knallte das Auto gegen die Brücke.

translation.en: I just remember the... the glass hitting my face
translation.de: Ich weiß nur noch, wie mir Glas ins Gesicht flog

translation.en: and Eleanor screaming.
Then... after that, it just all goes blank.
translation.de: Und dann... danach gingen die Lichter aus.

translation.en: When I woke up in the hospital,
my mom told me she was gone.
translation.de: sagte mir Mom, sie sei tot.

translation.en: And that was it.
Still mad you got in the car?
-[Finch] You really built this yourself? -Yes, I did.
That's impressive.
-[man] All right. Here we go. -[Finch] Let's do it.
translation.de: DER BLAUE BLITZ -Ok. Los geht's. -Also los.

translation.en: -[Violet laughs] -[man] Have a good one.
I can see my house from here.
-That was amazing. -[woman] Good job!
Did it feel fast? -Oh, yeah. It's just like the real thing. -[Violet laughs]
translation.de: -Fühlte es sich schnell an? -Oh ja, ganz wie die echten.

translation.en: Are you ready?
All right. Here we go. You ready?
translation.de: Ok. Los geht's. Bist du bereit?

translation.en: Oh, my God.
-[Violet whooping] -[Finch] Yes!
Oh, my God!
I wanna go again.
I got you somethin'. It's in the door.
translation.de: In der Tür ist etwas für dich.

translation.en: That, Ultraviolet, is a special place
translation.de: Das, Ultraviolet, ist ein besonderer Ort,

translation.en: that I'm gonna take you to one day.
translation.de: an den ich dich mal mitnehme.

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
Yeah, but you're gonna need to start pullin' your weight, OK?
translation.de: Ja, aber du musst auch deinen Beitrag leisten.

translation.en: I got you this...
just in case you've forgotten this is a school project,
translation.de: Da es ja ein Schulprojekt ist,

translation.en: you have to write about it.
Just me? You're the writer.
[Violet] "Wander number three..."
No. You gotta start with Hoosier Hill.
You know, you don't have to be so pushy.
You say "pushy," and I hear, um...
"assertive,"
"bold,"
"inspiring."
Uh... relentless. Irritating.
Arrogant. [laughs]
It's nice to have a friend again.
translation.de: Gut, wieder einen Freund zu haben.

translation.en: Don't let that go to your head.
Too late.
You know what I like about you, Ultraviolet?
translation.de: Weißt du, was ich an dir mag?

translation.en: What?
[Finch] You're all the colors in one... at full brightness.
translation.de: Du vereinst alle Farben, bei voller Leuchtkraft.

translation.en: -[teacher] Hello. -[door closes]
Before we get started, we are nearing D-Day, people.
translation.de: Bevor wir anfangen: Der D-Day steht bevor, Herrschaften.

translation.en: The day to present your wanderings. That is correct.
translation.de: Der Tag, an dem Sie Ihre Projekte vorstellen.

translation.en: Along with your essay, I'm going to be asking each group to do a presentation to the whole class.
translation.de: Zusätzlich zum Aufsatz muss jedes Team ein Referat vor der ganzen Klasse halten.

translation.en: But today, we're talking about the five themes of geography:
translation.de: Aber heute geht es um die fünf Aspekte der Geographie:

translation.en: location, place...
No, but honestly, I wouldn't even worry about it.
translation.de: Ehrlich, ich würde mir da keine Sorgen machen.

translation.en: -This is just what Finch does. -[girl] Yeah.
I've texted him for the past couple days, and he hasn't responded.
translation.de: Ich simse ihm seit zwei Tagen und er antwortet nicht.

translation.en: I mean, this is... [girl sighs]
...I mean, sometimes he's gone for a day, like, maybe two, but he always turns up.
translation.de: Manchmal ist er ein, zwei Tage weg, aber er taucht immer wieder auf.

translation.en: [boy] Yeah, there was that one time that he was gone for like a week.
translation.de: Ja, einmal war er sogar eine ganze Woche weg.

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -He came back and said he went camping,
and he had all these poison ivy spots on him...
-Covered in spots. -...itching, it was like... yeah.
translation.de: -Er hatte juckende Brennnessel-Flecken. -Überall. -Er war... ja. -Es war schlimm, echt schlimm.

translation.en: It was bad. It was so bad. [chuckling]
translation.de: -Er war... ja. -Es war schlimm, echt schlimm.

translation.en: I think it's pretty fucked up.
It's easy to pick up your phone and respond.
translation.de: Es ist leicht, ans Handy zu gehen.

translation.en: It's... that's just something you have to deal with
translation.de: Das ist... Damit musst du klarkommen, wenn du mit ihm abhängen willst.

translation.en: if you wanna be close with him, you know?
translation.de: Damit musst du klarkommen, wenn du mit ihm abhängen willst.

translation.en: It just makes me mad.
Yeah. So, we've been to a lot of really interesting places so far.
translation.de: Wir waren an vielen interessanten Orten.

translation.en: [Violet's dad] Do you have an actual plan, or you've just kind of been shooting from the hip?
translation.de: Hast du eigentlich einen Plan oder machst du alles spontan?

translation.en: Honestly? I'm just trying to distract her into spending as much time with me as she can. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ich will sie ablenken, damit sie möglichst viel Zeit mit mir verbringt.

translation.en: [Violet's dad] And has it been going OK, or--
Yeah, I think so. I've been really...
[Violet's mom] Look who stopped by.
Did you lose your phone? I've been texting. I've been calling.
translation.de: Ist dein Handy weg? Ich simste, rief an.

translation.en: Look, let me just show you this really fast. Hold on.
translation.de: Ich will dir schnell was zeigen.

translation.en: -You could've taken a second to respond... -I know.
-...so I knew you were OK. -I had to take care of a couple things.
[Finch] It's supposedly bottomless.
In the '50s, a group of boys went swimming here,
translation.de: In den 50ern waren Jungs hier schwimmen...

translation.en: and they disappeared. No one ever found their bodies.
[Violet] They drowned?
maybe.
Or maybe they found the other side.
translation.de: Oder sie fanden die andere Seite.

translation.en: They say there's a force in the middle that sucks you into an underground river
translation.de: Angeblich saugt dich eine Kraft in einen unterirdischen Fluss,

translation.en: and leads you to another world.
translation.de: der in eine andere Welt führt.

translation.en: You're not going in?
Oh, of course I am.
It'll be freezing.
It'll be fine.
You should come in.
-No, I'm good. -What are you afraid of?
-It's cold. -Serious question:
what are you most afraid of?
translation.de: Wovor hast du am meisten Angst?

translation.en: Dying.
I don't believe that.
Being ordinary.
[Finch] So, don't be ordinary.
[Violet] Oh, my God!
-[Violet shrieks] -[Finch] Oh. OK!
-Oh, you're right. Fucking freezing! -[Violet] Oh, my God!
translation.de: -Du hast recht. Verdammt kalt! -Oh mein Gott!

translation.en: [Finch] OK, let's go under.
-Yeah? -OK.
One, two, three.
[Finch] Marco!
[Violet] Polo!
So, what are you most afraid of?
I don't know. I guess losing my sister.
translation.de: Vielleicht davor, meine Schwester zu verlieren.

translation.en: My mom's gone a lot.
My dad left a while ago. New town, new family.
translation.de: Mein Dad ist schon länger weg. Neue Stadt, neue Familie.

translation.en: So, Kate's basically all I have.
translation.de: Kate ist praktisch alles, was ich habe.

translation.en: How'd you get that?
I'm going in search of the bottom.
Asshole!
What?
[gasps] Do you know how scared I was?
[Finch] Hey. Hey, Violet. Violet, I'm sorry!
translation.de: Hey. Hey, Violet. Es tut mir leid!

translation.en: Violet, I'm sorry.
Violet! [Violet] I thought you drowned!
I'm sorry. Hey, I'm sorry.
I didn't... I didn't mean to scare you.
Well, you did.
That was the last thing that I wanted to do.
translation.de: Das war das Letzte, was ich wollte.

translation.en: Where do you go when you disappear?
Tell me something real about you.
translation.de: Erzähl mir was Echtes über dich.

translation.en: Or I'm leaving.
OK.
Sometimes I have to go to places that make me feel like myself.
translation.de: Manchmal muss ich an Orte, an denen ich mich wie ich fühle,

translation.en: I need to do things that remind me that I'm in control.
translation.de: um Dinge zu tun, die mich daran erinnern, dass ich die Kontrolle habe.

translation.en: My dad used to...
get in these dark moods.
Did he do that to you?
I used to be a lot smaller.
I used to not know how to get out of the way.
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, wie man dem entgeht.

translation.en: People don't like messy, right?
-[Violet] Uh... -[Finch] Yeah.
-Oh, wait. Yeah, you got it. -I know, I had it!
translation.de: -Warte. Ja, du hast es. -Ich hatte es!

translation.en: [both singing] ♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
translation.de: Ich traf dich auf der Brücke

translation.en: ♪ What's going on Inside that pretty head? ♪
translation.de: Was geht in diesem hübschen Kopf vor?

translation.en: ♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
translation.de: Ich traf dich auf der Brücke

translation.en: ♪ Why don't you come talk to me instead? ♪
translation.de: Komm lieber zu mir und wir reden

translation.en: -[Violet giggles] And then it goes-- -There's the bridge.
[Finch] ♪ I... ♪
-Yeah. No, you got it. -OK.
[both singing] ♪ I met you ♪
♪ I met you ♪
♪ I met you standin' on a ledge ♪
translation.de: Ich traf dich auf der Brücke

translation.en: [gasps] Finch.
Finch, wake up. We gotta go.
translation.de: Finch, wach auf. Wir müssen los.

translation.en: [Finch] Oh, shit!
I'm sorry. I'm sorry. My phone died.
translation.de: Es tut mir leid. Mein Akku war alle.

translation.en: Violet, inside. -Finch, just... you should go home. -[Finch] Don't blame her.
translation.de: Violet, rein da. Finch, geh lieber nach Hause.

translation.en: -If I could explain. Please-- -It's not his fault!
translation.de: -Ich bin schuld. -Ist er nicht! -Geh ins Haus. Wir reden später. -Ich vergaß die Zeit.

translation.en: Just get in the house. -We'll talk about it later. -I lost track of time.
translation.de: -Geh ins Haus. Wir reden später. -Ich vergaß die Zeit.

translation.en: -Finch! -If I could--
I'm so... I'm so sorry.
It was my fault. I fucked up.
translation.de: Ich bin schuld, ich hab's verbockt.

translation.en: Please, just don't blame her. Please. I'm sorry.
translation.de: Bitte, geben Sie ihr nicht die Schuld. Es tut mir leid.

translation.en: Just... go home.
[Mom] Do you have any clue
what horrible situations we had you in, in our heads?
translation.de: welche furchtbaren Situationen wir uns ausmalten?

translation.en: You have to understand how that felt,
translation.de: Du musst verstehen, wie sich das anfühlte,

translation.en: your dad and I not knowing where you were.
translation.de: nicht zu wissen, wo du bist.

translation.en: I said I was sorry.
But you didn't have to treat Finch like that.
Well, he's the boy that kept our daughter out all night.
translation.de: Mit ihm war unsere Tochter die ganze Nacht weg.

translation.en: I kept him out all night, too, Mom.
translation.de: Er war genauso mit mir weg, Mom.

translation.en: Hey, V. Hey, what's up?
How are you?
-Fine. -It's been a minute. What's been going on?
translation.de: -Gut. -Es ist lange her. Was ging ab?

translation.en: I can't deal with you right now.
Is everything OK?
Honestly, I don't know.
I'm not tryin' to be an asshole, but you should know what you're getting into.
translation.de: Du solltest wissen, worauf du dich da einlässt.

translation.en: -I do. -No, you don't.
-He-- -Let's go.
-Where've you been? -You know why she's hangin' out with you?
translation.de: -Wo warst du? -Du weißt, was sie tut?

translation.en: She's tryin' to fix you.
Shut up, Roamer! Just...
[Roamer] You have no idea who he really is, do you? He's a freak!
translation.de: Du kennst ihn nicht wirklich, oder? Er ist ein Freak!

translation.en: -Call me a freak one more time. -You're a fuckin' freak.
[Violet] Finch!
[Violet] Stop!
Finch! Yo, let him go, man. Get off him.
translation.de: Finch! Lass ihn los. Runter von ihm.

translation.en: Finch, stop! Stop!
[girl 1] Oh, my God!
[girl 2] What the hell? He almost killed him.
[boy] He's crazy.
Fuck!
Fuck! Fuck! Fuck!
Anything?
Guess he's gone again.
I've been friends with the guy since minute one,
translation.de: Ich bin mit ihm ewig befreundet...

translation.en: and I haven't waited for his call in years.
He just...
gets in this mood sometimes, and...
it's hard, you know?
He's not easy,
and everybody who gets close to him gets burned out.
translation.de: Alle, die ihm näherkommen, brennen aus.

translation.en: So, why do you stick around?
Because...
'cause I love him.
He thinks everybody leaves him and I won't do that.
translation.de: Er denkt, jeder verlässt ihn. Ich tue das nicht.

translation.en: This is what we do.
I'm gonna get mad, he's gonna come back and apologize,
translation.de: Ich werde sauer, er kommt zurück und entschuldigt sich,

translation.en: and it'll be like it never even happened.
translation.de: und es ist, als sei nichts gewesen.

translation.en: Is... is Finch here?
Did something happen?
[Kate] Yeah, come on in.
[girl] I'm Lindsay.
Um... I'm OCD and just got diagnosed with a social anxiety disorder,
translation.de: Ich habe eine Zwangsstörung und eine soziale Phobie.

translation.en: so being here with everyone is not intimidating at all.
translation.de: Ich sitze hier also ganz locker mit euch allen.

translation.en: Last year, I started cutting myself.
translation.de: Letztes Jahr begann ich zu ritzen.

translation.en: I still deal with it, but I'm here.
translation.de: Ich kämpfe immer noch damit, aber ich bin hier.

translation.en: I'm so sorry. No worries. Have a seat.
translation.de: -Es tut mir sehr leid. -Kein Ding. Setz dich.

translation.en: [boy] Hi, I'm Bradley.
Um... I am ADHD, OCD, BPD, DID, and bipolar.
translation.de: Ich habe ADHS, eine Zwangsstörung, eine Borderline-Störung, DIS und BAS.

translation.en: Yeah. [chuckles]
Um... you'd think some of those would cancel the others out, but...
translation.de: Manches sollte sich gegenseitig ausschließen, aber...

translation.en: Yeah, my week's been OK.
I've been watching a lot of basketball lately,
translation.de: Ich schaue zurzeit viel Basketball, und das hilft mir sehr.

translation.en: and that's been helping a lot, so...
translation.de: Ich schaue zurzeit viel Basketball, und das hilft mir sehr. Also...

translation.en: Good.
Hi. Welcome.
I'm, uh... Theodore Finch.
No labels.
Not really sure why I'm here. [chuckles lightly]
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht recht, warum ich hier bin.

translation.en: I guess it's 'cause I... I got in this fight at school and,
translation.de: Wahrscheinlich weil ich mich in der Schule geprügelt habe und...

translation.en: like,
I was there, but I wasn't there.
translation.de: Ich war da, aber irgendwie auch... nicht.

translation.en: I was watchin' myself, and...
translation.de: Ich sah mir selbst zu und...

translation.en: I-I-I just get a little lost sometimes.
I run... a lot.
Sometimes that helps.
Kind of.
I don't know. Is that enough?
Sure.
Thanks. Glad you're here.
translation.de: Danke. Schön, dass du da bist.

translation.en: Amanda, why don't you go ahead?
I'm Amanda.
I'm bulimic.
I've tried to kill myself twice.
I think about it almost every day.
[Kate] Hey, have you heard anything yet?
-No. -[Kate sighs] OK.
I gotta go to work. I'm gonna be late. But you should stay.
translation.de: Ich muss zur Arbeit. Aber du solltest bleiben.

translation.en: Why does he keep doing this?
I don't know.
Have him call me when you hear from him, OK?
translation.de: Sag ihm, er soll mich anrufen, ok?

translation.en: Yeah.
-[Kate] Bye. -Bye.
[Amanda] I heard you beat the shit outta Roamer.
Why do you keep doing stuff like that? Aren't you tired of people talking about you all the time?
translation.de: Warum tust du das? Bist du das Gerede nicht leid?

translation.en: People are always gonna talk.
It's their specialty.
Are you OK?
I don't know. I feel like I keep messing things up,
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ich baue immer nur Scheiße,

translation.en: and I'm not sure I know how to not do that.
translation.de: und ich weiß nicht genau, wie ich es abstellen soll.

translation.en: Does this work?
It's better than the alternative.
[Kate] Your girlfriend's pretty worried about you.
She's been at the house all afternoon.
translation.de: Sie war den ganzen Tag bei uns.

translation.en: What's going on?
I don't... really remember...
translation.de: Ich erinnere mich... nicht allzu gut...

translation.en: Dad that well.
And everything I do...
remember is... is bad.
Are there any...
good memories you have of him?
Well, the fact that he would beat the shit out of us
translation.de: Die Tatsache, dass er uns öfter verprügelte,

translation.en: kind of negated all the good times.
But why was he like that?
Was he like that because of us? Was he...
translation.de: War er wegen uns so? War er...

translation.en: like that because of Mom?
He was like that because he was a shitty person.
translation.de: Er war einfach ein beschissener Mensch.

translation.en: [Finch] There has to be a reason, though.
translation.de: Aber es muss einen Grund geben.

translation.en: Because if there's a reason, then he could get better.
translation.de: Wenn es einen gibt, könnte er sich bessern.

translation.en: Something or...
someone could make him better, right?
I don't know. Who cares? Dude, he's someone else's problem.
translation.de: Wen juckt's? Er ist das Problem von jemand anderem.

translation.en: Why are you asking me about Dad?
What's going on, Finch?
Come on. You can talk to me, man.
translation.de: Komm. Du kannst mit mir reden.

translation.en: Nothing, Kate. Sorry. Nothing.
translation.de: Nichts, Kate. Tut mir leid. Nichts.

translation.en: I'm good.
Are you sure? Because I have to open the bar,
translation.de: Sicher? Ich muss die Bar aufmachen.

translation.en: -but I can find someone to cover me. -I'm good. [chuckles]
translation.de: -Aber ich finde eine Vertretung. -Mir geht's gut.

translation.en: You know I love you, right, Theo?
I know.
You scared me.
What is all of this?
[Finch] I'm trying to focus.
[Violet] Focus on what?
On staying awake.
I don't understand what that means.
translation.de: Ich verstehe nicht, was du meinst.

translation.en: Sometimes I... go blank.
I... get into these dark moods.
translation.de: Ich komme in eine düstere Stimmung.

translation.en: I think too fast to keep track of anything,
translation.de: Ich denke zu schnell, um Dingen zu folgen.

translation.en: and then it's like...
all my thoughts are gone at once.
And sometimes, if I put 'em up there, I can...
translation.de: Und wenn ich sie da oben hinstecke, kann ich mich...

translation.en: focus and slow down, but...
I can't right now. I can't.
translation.de: Aber zurzeit nicht, es geht nicht.

translation.en: OK.
[Finch] And this usually works. Maybe there's too much clutter.
translation.de: Normalerweise klappt es. Vielleicht ist hier zu viel Krempel.

translation.en: I can fix it. I just...
translation.de: Ich kriege das hin. Ich brauche nur Zeit, um herauszufinden wie.

translation.en: I just need time to figure this out.
translation.de: Ich brauche nur Zeit, um herauszufinden wie.

translation.en: -[Violet] I'm trying to help you. -I don't need your help!
translation.de: -Ich will dir helfen. -Ich brauche deine Hilfe nicht!

translation.en: This is on me! This isn't about you!
translation.de: Ich muss das tun! Es geht nicht um dich!

translation.en: You need to tell me what's wrong.
You don't get it.
You're right.
I don't get it.
Don't you know, Violet?
I'm "The Freak."
I'm fucked up!
I need you to leave.
Go!
[voicemail] Hey, it's Finch. Leave a message.
translation.de: Hier ist Finch. Sprecht mir drauf.

translation.en: Hey, Finch. Um... [sobs]
I'm sorry.
I'm just sorry that I pushed.
And... I...
just need you to come back.
I just really need you to come back, OK?
translation.de: Ich will echt, dass du zurückkommst, ok?

translation.en: Hey, kiddo.
Hey.
Yeah?
On Eleanor's birthday...
I wasn't really thinking.
I found myself at the bridge.
translation.de: Ich war plötzlich an der Brücke.

translation.en: I was standing on a ledge.
That's how I met Finch.
He found me there.
He saved me.
You... you weren't gonna...
I'm OK.
I was...
confused.
I was sad.
I'm OK.
I'm better now.
Well, I'm glad Finch was there.
translation.de: Ich bin froh, dass Finch da war.

translation.en: Me too.
[Violet] I just wish I knew where he was.
translation.de: Ich wüsste nur gern, wo er steckt.

translation.en: Well...
you two have been a lot of places.
Is there any place else he might go?
translation.de: Könnte er an einem davon sein?

translation.en: [man] On behalf of Finch's family, I wanna thank you all for being here today.
translation.de: Im Namen von Finchs Familie danke ich allen, die heute hier sind.

translation.en: We've gathered to celebrate and to honor the memory of one
translation.de: Wir haben uns hier versammelt, um eines Menschen zu gedenken,

translation.en: who will be incredibly missed because he has been so dearly loved.
translation.de: der uns sehr fehlen wird, weil wir ihn so sehr geliebt haben.

translation.en: The events of these past few days...
I'm gonna say bye. OK, we'll wait for you.
translation.de: -Ich verabschiede mich. -Ok, wir warten auf dich.

translation.en: [girl] Hey.
I should've been there.
I miss him.
Just so fucked.
[Violet] I had no idea.
Sorry that I wasn't there for you.
translation.de: Ich war nicht für dich da.

translation.en: It's OK.
I didn't know how to tell you.
I would miss you.
Yeah, I know you would. [chuckles]
[Violet] "Travelers' Prayer Chapel,
created as a sanctuary for the weary travelers to stop and rest along their way.
translation.de: Ein Zufluchtsort für müde Reisende, damit sie sich unterwegs erholen können.

translation.en: It was built in memoriam to those
who have lost their lives in auto accidents...
translation.de: die bei Autounfällen ums Leben kamen.

translation.en: and as a place for healing.
We remember those who are no longer here,
translation.de: Wir gedenken derer, die gegangen sind,

translation.en: who were taken from us too soon, and who we will always keep in our hearts."
translation.de: die uns zu früh entrissen wurden und für immer in unseren Herzen bleiben."

translation.en: [Violet] I used to be worried about everything.
Things that seemed meaningful...
were actually meaningless.
I worried about life.
translation.de: Ich sorgte mich um das Leben.

translation.en: I worried about what would happen if I let myself feel again.
translation.de: Darum, was kommt, wenn ich wieder Gefühle zulasse.

translation.en: I thought I didn't deserve to.
Then...
without really knowing...
I changed.
I wasn't worried about what would happen if I lived.
translation.de: Ich war nicht darum besorgt, was mein weiteres Leben bringt...

translation.en: I was worried about what would happen if I didn't.
What I would miss.
I worried about not remembering.
Not remembering all of the moments...
translation.de: Dass ich all die Momente vergesse.

translation.en: all of the places... [chuckles]
...and that's because of Finch.
Because he taught me to wander.
translation.de: Er brachte mir das Wandern bei.

translation.en: [Violet] He taught me that you don't have to climb a mountain to stand on top of the world.
translation.de: Und dass man keinen Gipfel erklimmen muss, um ganz oben zu stehen.

translation.en: That even the ugliest of places can be beautiful,
translation.de: Dass selbst die hässlichsten Orte schön sein können,

translation.en: as long as you take the time to look.
That it's OK to get lost...
translation.de: Dass es ok ist, sich zu verirren,

translation.en: as long as you find your way back.
translation.de: solange man den Weg zurück findet.

translation.en: But in learning all of that,
I missed seeing something more important...
seeing Finch.
I missed that he was in pain.
I missed that he was teaching me all along
translation.de: Und dass er mir die ganze Zeit beibrachte,

translation.en: how to move on.
Finch was a dreamer.
He dreamt while he was awake.
translation.de: Er träumte, als er wach war.

translation.en: He dreamt of all the beauty in the world, and he made it come to life.
translation.de: Er träumte von der Schönheit der Welt und er erweckte sie zum Leben.

translation.en: Finch taught me that there's beauty in the most unexpected of places.
translation.de: Finch brachte mir bei, dass man Schönheit findet, wo man sie gar nicht erwartet.

translation.en: And that there are bright places,
translation.de: Und dass es helle Orte gibt,

translation.en: even in dark times.
And that if there isn't...
you can be that bright place...
translation.de: kann man selbst ein heller Ort sein

translation.en: with infinite capacities.
